segments.text: Hello , BCD Company , can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , may I speak to Mrs Smith ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is Mrs Smith , may I have your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Sun , and I interviewed with you yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am calling to thank you for giving me the interview for the Sales Manager position yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really enjoyed meeting with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You certainly made a good impression on me , as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am very interested in this position .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll be making the decision by the end of this week and we'll contact you as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , thank you for your time and consideration again .
segments.speaker: S2
